item.title: Difficulty With Data
item.description: What does data mean for marketing Along with the development of digital marketing, audience data becomes more critical for the campaigns. Nevertheless, how much can data help in the marketing campaigns ? No one can measure that so far like what was happening more than a century ago. Data plays a very sophisticated role in the online marketing for now, not only for marketers but also for the media providers/publishers as well.
